Note: "anthracene unit" is included as a property since it is the specific component of the copolymers that contributes to the high crystallinity and charge carrier mobility. However, without additional context, it is unclear if "anthracene unit" is being described as a material property itself or just a component of the material. Therefore, it is listed with a caution.
